fields.description:
{html}

4th gen ipod touch, mobile sdk build 1.5.0.3ee6a97 seen on 4.2.1 only

local/embedded video - brief bit of audio plays as completion alert shows (during completion event?)
1.Phone > play Movie
2.Local or embedded
3.let it play to end
results: movie plays till end, then windows closes and while the movie completion alert shows a brifef bit of audio plays.

{html}
fields.summary: iOS, 4.2.1 - local/embedded video - brief bit of audio plays as completion alert shows (during completion event?)

comments.body: Cannot reproduce in SDK 2.2.0.014b86f on iPhone Sim 5.1.
